name: Salt Thrust
description: infinitely bouncing ball on the sea in your library
minimum_requirements: OS: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8650 Memory: 2 GB RAM MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack) Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Phenom™ II X3 or better Memory: 6 GB RAM GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
